title: Skip the Series 10 and save $150 on the Apple Watch 9 right now
content:
Macworld

The Apple Watch Series 10 arrives this week, but if you just want a great smartwatch at a great price, a discounted Series 9 is your best bet right now. And we’ve got a great one: The 41mm Apple Watch Series 9 with cellular is just $349 at Walmart, a savings of $150 and the best price we’ve seen on this model.

We reviewed the Apple Watch 9 and easily gave it a 4-star rating and our Editors’ Choice award, thrilled about the timeless design and the great battery life. “The Apple Watch Series 9 is just like the Series 8 but improves on it in a few small ways: the processor is faster, battery life is considerably better, the screen is brighter, and you get the new double tap feature. Almost by default, the Series 9 wins the title of the best general-purpose smartwatch Apple has ever made,” our review reads.

The smartwatch has a beautiful and bright screen and is super useful for keeping track of your fitness and health journeys. It can even monitor your heart by taking ECGs. It’s also ready for watchOS 11, which brings the new Vitals app and activity enhancements. And with cellular connectivity (which requires a separate monthly fee from your carrier) you can stay connected without an iPhone, send texts, and easily stream music.

So go ahead and save $150 on one of the 9th-generation Apple Watch with both GPS and cellular.
